sentence: Stepan Company ( SCL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on March 02, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.225 per share is scheduled to be paid on March 15, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased SCL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 9.76% increase over prior dividend payment.
The previous trading day's last sale of SCL was $80.1, representing a -13.84% decrease from the 52 week high of $92.97 and a 16.51% increase over the 52 week low of $68.75.
SCL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
SCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.92.
Zacks Investment Research reports SCL's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 11.08%, compared to an industry average of 15.2%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SCL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
